title: Hunted
description: I'd been kept a secret my whole life. But no more.I'm a rare Fae and I've been kept a secret since birth. My parents were murdered when I was younger, leaving my brother and me in the care of our guardian Max. It was just the three of us until the worst thing happened. My brother was murdered. Just like my parents.Now I've forced my guardian to let me enrol at Santa Catalina University because I want to discover the truth. My brother's death was ruled a suicide, but I know my brother. He would never have left me behind.Suddenly, I'm thrown into a world I know nothing about. A world of secrets, fae and the mafia. There's something shady going on at the SCU and I have a feeling the Trevino brothers are involved. I don't care how hot they are, they are definitely shady looking. But with the help of my new friends, Fynn and Alena, I might just survive long enough to uncover what really happened to my brother.I mean, it's university. What's the worst that could happen?Hunted is a reverse harem romance, meaning our FMC will have more than one love interest and wonâ€™t have to choose between them at the end. The SCU series consists of 11 stories all set in the university and shared world, and each can be read independently and in any order. Hunted is the fifth book in the series and is a standalone with a HEA
author: Bailey Grayson
